title: Interpreting Women's Lives: Feminist Theory and Personal Narratives
description: ..". rich and thought-provoking... This book is to be recommended to anyone interested in feminist research..." --MonatshefteThis groundbreaking multidisciplinary and multicultural examination of women's oral and written documents offers rich insights into the ways that women's voices and life stories can inform scholarly research.
